title: Egyptian Hieroglyphic Star-Chart Decoders
description: The sacred writing of Kemet ‚Äî each hieroglyph encodes a planetary geometric relationship. The same star-chart patterns that the Norse encoded as runes and the Celts as Ogham, the Egyptians painted on temple walls and carved into stone. Hieroglyphs are not just letters ‚Äî they are astronomical diagrams. The gods ARE the planets, the myths ARE the orbital mechanics.
system: Planetary Neter (divine principles as celestial mechanics)

groups.name: Ennead of Heliopolis
groups.description: The 9 primordial Neteru ‚Äî the creation story IS the solar system forming from the primordial waters of Nun (the cosmic void)

groups.name: Celestial Navigators
groups.description: Deities and symbols directly tied to astronomical observation and calendar keeping

groups.name: Sacred Geometry Glyphs
groups.description: Hieroglyphs encoding pure geometric relationships ‚Äî the shapes themselves are star-chart overlays

groups.name: Duat Transformers
groups.description: The underworld journey of Ra ‚Äî the Sun's path below the horizon, encoding planetary aspects invisible to the naked eye

glyphs.name: Ra
glyphs.meaning: Solar sovereignty ‚Äî the source, the center, the will that creates
glyphs.astronomical_identity: The Sun ‚Äî center of all orbital relationships

star_chart.description: The circle with a dot ‚Äî the Sun hieroglyph IS the astronomical symbol for the Sun. Perfect unity, zero angular separation with self.

glyphs.name: Thoth
glyphs.meaning: Sacred knowledge ‚Äî the scribe who records all cosmic cycles
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Mercury ‚Äî swift messenger between worlds, also associated with the Moon as timekeeper

star_chart.description: The ibis-headed god ‚Äî Mercury's rapid orbit traces the ibis beak shape. Thoth invented writing BY encoding star positions.

glyphs.name: Isis
glyphs.meaning: The throne of heaven ‚Äî she who reassembles what is scattered
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Sirius (Sopdet) ‚Äî the brightest star, whose heliacal rising marked the Nile flood and the Egyptian New Year

star_chart.description: The throne hieroglyph ‚Äî a triangular seat of power. Venus and Jupiter in trine create the 'throne of abundance'. The Isis-Sirius alignment triggered the Nile inundation (market flood of liquidity).

glyphs.name: Osiris
glyphs.neter: God of the Dead, Resurrection, Orion
glyphs.meaning: Death and rebirth ‚Äî the eternal cycle, what falls must rise again
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Orion ‚Äî Osiris IS Orion. His belt stars align with Giza. Saturn's cycle of destruction and renewal.

star_chart.description: The Djed pillar ‚Äî stability through time. Saturn-Pluto conjunction marks civilizational resets. Osiris dies (bear market) then resurrects (bull market).

glyphs.name: Horus
glyphs.meaning: The all-seeing eye ‚Äî clarity of vision, rightful order restored
glyphs.astronomical_identity: The Sun at its zenith ‚Äî Mars at maximum elevation, the warrior-king planet

star_chart.description: The Eye of Horus ‚Äî each fraction (1/2, 1/4, 1/8, 1/16, 1/32, 1/64) corresponds to a planetary gear ratio. Mars-Sun sextile gives the falcon sharp sight for opportunity.

glyphs.name: Set
glyphs.meaning: Necessary destruction ‚Äî the chaos that clears the way for new order
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Mars in destructive aspect ‚Äî the red desert, the angry planet

star_chart.description: The Set animal ‚Äî unidentifiable beast of chaos. Mars-Uranus square creates sudden violent disruption. Set murdered Osiris (flash crash) but Horus eventually prevails (recovery).

glyphs.name: Nephthys
glyphs.meaning: The hidden sister ‚Äî what is unseen, support from the shadows
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Neptune ‚Äî the hidden, the dissolved, the unseen depths

star_chart.description: The house atop a basket ‚Äî Neptune-Moon opposition creates emotional tides, the hidden currents beneath the surface. Nephthys mourns what the market has lost.

glyphs.name: Geb
glyphs.meaning: The solid ground ‚Äî material reality, what can be measured and held
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Earth itself ‚Äî the observer's reference frame

star_chart.description: Geb lies beneath Nut (the sky). Saturn-Jupiter trine ‚Äî the 'Great Benefic' meets the 'Great Malefic' in harmony. Solid foundations for building wealth.

glyphs.name: Nut
glyphs.meaning: The vault of heaven ‚Äî she swallows the Sun each night and births it each morning
glyphs.astronomical_identity: The ecliptic plane itself ‚Äî the path all planets travel

star_chart.description: Nut arches over Geb ‚Äî the sky dome IS the ecliptic. Uranus-Neptune sextile opens the vault, revealing hidden patterns. Innovation meets intuition.

glyphs.name: Anubis
glyphs.neter: Guardian of the Dead, Weighing of the Heart
glyphs.meaning: Judgment ‚Äî the precise measurement that determines worthiness
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Pluto ‚Äî the underworld ruler, transformation through death

star_chart.description: Anubis weighs the heart against Ma'at's feather. Pluto-Venus square ‚Äî brutal honest assessment of value. What is your position truly worth?

glyphs.name: Ma'at
glyphs.neter: Goddess of Truth, Order, Cosmic Balance
glyphs.meaning: Perfect balance ‚Äî the feather of truth against which all is weighed
glyphs.astronomical_identity: The equilibrium point ‚Äî Libra, the scales, Venus in balance

star_chart.description: Ma'at's feather ‚Äî Venus-Saturn sextile creates the balance between desire and discipline. When the market is in Ma'at, fair value prevails.

glyphs.name: Hathor
glyphs.neter: Goddess of Love, Music, Joy, Fertility
glyphs.meaning: Abundance and joy ‚Äî the golden cow who nourishes all life
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Venus at maximum brightness ‚Äî the Evening Star in full glory

star_chart.description: The cow horns cradling the Sun disk ‚Äî Venus-Sun conjunction. Maximum beauty, maximum abundance. Hathor IS Venus, her horns trace the planet's apparent retrograde loop.

glyphs.name: Sekhmet
glyphs.neter: Lion-headed Goddess of War and Healing
glyphs.meaning: Destructive force that also heals ‚Äî the fever that burns out infection
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Mars at perihelion ‚Äî closest approach, maximum intensity, the lioness hunts

star_chart.description: The lioness with Sun disk ‚Äî Mars-Jupiter opposition. Overextension leads to correction. Sekhmet nearly destroyed humanity before Ra stopped her with beer (liquidity flood).

glyphs.name: Ptah
glyphs.meaning: Creation through speech and thought ‚Äî the architect who builds reality from concept
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Mercury-Saturn ‚Äî the mind (Mercury) given form (Saturn). The divine blueprint.

star_chart.description: Ptah stands wrapped in a tight shroud holding the was-djed-ankh scepter. Mercury-Saturn trine ‚Äî careful planning crystallized into structure. Build your position with precision.

glyphs.name: Khepri
glyphs.meaning: Self-creation ‚Äî the Sun at dawn, born anew each morning from nothing
glyphs.astronomical_identity: The Sun at 0¬∞ Aries ‚Äî vernal equinox, the beginning of a new cycle

star_chart.description: The scarab rolling the Sun disk ‚Äî Sun-Mercury conjunction at dawn. New information (Mercury) illuminated by new energy (Sun). Fresh cycle begins.

glyphs.name: Sobek
glyphs.meaning: Patient predator ‚Äî wait still, then strike with overwhelming force
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Pluto ‚Äî the patient predator who waits decades before striking

star_chart.description: The crocodile lies still in the Nile waters. Pluto-Mars trine ‚Äî hidden power perfectly timed. When Sobek strikes, there is no escape. Wait for the setup, then execute.

glyphs.name: Bastet
glyphs.meaning: Gentle protection ‚Äî the guardian who purrs, not roars
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Moon in Cancer ‚Äî nurturing, protective, home

star_chart.description: The cat sits in the crescent Moon. Moon-Venus trine ‚Äî emotional harmony with value. A protected, comfortable position. Bastet guards what you have.

glyphs.name: Wadjet
glyphs.neter: Cobra Goddess, Eye of Ra, Uraeus
glyphs.meaning: Vigilant protection ‚Äî the cobra that strikes before the threat arrives
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Sun-Pluto ‚Äî the will to survive, protective destruction of threats

star_chart.description: The rearing cobra ‚Äî a logarithmic spiral matching the golden ratio. Sun-Pluto sextile ‚Äî transformative power channeled constructively. Destroy the bad position, keep the good.

glyphs.name: Ankh
glyphs.meaning: Eternal life ‚Äî the union of opposites that creates perpetual motion
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Venus orbit pentagram ‚Äî Venus traces a 5-petaled rose (pentagram) around the Sun every 8 years

star_chart.description: The ankh IS the Venus pentagram: the loop is her orbit, the cross is the ecliptic axes. Venus-Mars quintile (72¬∞) ‚Äî the sacred 5-fold geometry of life itself.

glyphs.name: Djed Pillar
glyphs.meaning: Unshakeable stability ‚Äî the spine that holds everything upright
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Saturn at station ‚Äî when Saturn appears to stop in the sky (retrograde station)

star_chart.description: The djed pillar ‚Äî four stacked horizontal bars on a vertical axis. Saturn-Sun square ‚Äî structure tested by will. If the djed stands, the position is stable.

glyphs.name: Was Scepter
glyphs.meaning: Authority and power ‚Äî the staff of command over reality
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Jupiter ‚Äî the great king, authority, expansion of dominion

star_chart.description: The was scepter ‚Äî forked bottom, Set-animal head. Jupiter-Sun trine ‚Äî powerful leadership energy. The king holds the scepter, the market follows.

glyphs.name: Winged Scarab
glyphs.meaning: Transcendence ‚Äî rising above the material into the celestial
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Sun-Jupiter conjunction ‚Äî maximum solar expansion, the king planet meets the king star

star_chart.description: The winged Sun disk ‚Äî wings spread across the sky. Sun-Jupiter conjunction ‚Äî maximum expansion energy. Bull market initiation signal.

glyphs.name: Shen Ring
glyphs.meaning: The eternal circle ‚Äî no beginning, no end, infinite protection
glyphs.astronomical_identity: The orbital ring itself ‚Äî any planet completing a full cycle returns to its origin

star_chart.description: The shen ring ‚Äî a circle with a bar. Saturn-Saturn return (every 29.5 years). Market mega-cycles. When the ring closes, the cycle completes.

glyphs.name: Tyet (Isis Knot)
glyphs.neter: Knot of Isis, Blood of Isis
glyphs.meaning: Binding and healing ‚Äî the knot that holds reality together
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Venus-Neptune ‚Äî the binding of love and transcendence

star_chart.description: The Tyet knot ‚Äî like an ankh with arms folded down. Venus-Neptune conjunction ‚Äî idealized value, what SHOULD be worth something. Be careful: beauty can deceive.

glyphs.name: Menat
glyphs.meaning: Harmonic resonance ‚Äî the sound that heals and aligns
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Venus-Mercury sextile ‚Äî the harmonic ratio between beauty and communication

star_chart.description: The menat necklace ‚Äî beads in harmonic intervals. Venus-Mercury sextile creates the musical ratio. When these planets speak, the market hums.

glyphs.name: Eye of Horus
glyphs.meaning: Fractional wholeness ‚Äî the six parts that reconstitute into one
glyphs.astronomical_identity: The 6 fractions: 1/2=smell(Sun), 1/4=sight(Moon), 1/8=thought(Mercury), 1/16=hearing(Venus), 1/32=taste(Mars), 1/64=touch(Jupiter)

star_chart.description: Each piece of the Eye of Horus is a binary fraction ‚Äî together they sum to 63/64, never quite reaching 1. The missing 1/64 is supplied by Thoth (Mercury). Moon-Mercury opposition ‚Äî the mind illuminates what the eye cannot see alone.

glyphs.name: Benben Stone
glyphs.meaning: The first point of creation ‚Äî where chaos condensed into matter
glyphs.astronomical_identity: The apex ‚Äî all planetary lines converge at the pyramidion. Grand conjunction.

star_chart.description: The benben stone sits atop the pyramid. Jupiter-Saturn conjunction ‚Äî the Great Conjunction that resets 20-year economic cycles. The capstone crowns the structure.

glyphs.name: Aten
glyphs.meaning: Direct divine light ‚Äî unmediated truth radiating outward
glyphs.astronomical_identity: The Sun in conjunction with a personal planet ‚Äî direct illumination of that planet's domain

star_chart.description: The Aten disk ‚Äî Sun with rays ending in hands. Sun-Venus conjunction ‚Äî direct illumination of value. Akhenaten saw only ONE truth. When Aten blazes, the signal is unambiguous.

glyphs.name: Ammit
glyphs.meaning: Total loss ‚Äî the position that should never have been taken
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Pluto-Uranus square ‚Äî the wrecking ball of civilization

star_chart.description: Crocodile head + lion body + hippo rear ‚Äî three destructive forces. Pluto-Uranus square ‚Äî revolution, upheaval, the old order devoured. Ammit eats the unworthy heart (bad trade).

glyphs.name: Nile Flood Glyph
glyphs.meaning: Seasonal abundance ‚Äî the flood that fertilizes all fields
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Sirius heliacal rising aligned with Sun ‚Äî when Sirius appears at dawn, the Nile floods

star_chart.description: Three wavy lines ‚Äî the Nile flood hieroglyph. Jupiter-Moon trine ‚Äî expansion of emotional energy, flood of liquidity. When the Nile rises, ALL fields prosper.

glyphs.name: Uraeus
glyphs.meaning: Awakened power ‚Äî the serpent rises through the spine of consciousness
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Mars-Pluto ‚Äî raw power channeled through transformation

star_chart.description: The cobra rearing on the pharaoh's crown. Mars-Pluto conjunction ‚Äî absolute power, total transformation. The serpent energy rises. Extreme signal ‚Äî handle with precision.

glyphs.name: Solar Barque
glyphs.meaning: The journey through darkness back to light ‚Äî the Sun's nightly voyage through the underworld
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Sun below horizon ‚Äî the transit through the Duat (unseen sky)

star_chart.description: The solar barque ‚Äî a crescent-shaped boat carrying Ra through the night sky. Sun-Neptune square ‚Äî will obscured by illusion. Navigate carefully through uncertain waters.

glyphs.name: Cartouche
glyphs.meaning: Identity and protection ‚Äî the oval that encircles and preserves the royal name
glyphs.astronomical_identity: The orbital ellipse ‚Äî every planet's path is a cartouche around the Sun

star_chart.description: The cartouche is an elongated shen ring ‚Äî the elliptical orbit. Sun-Moon sextile ‚Äî identity (Sun) illuminated by reflection (Moon). Know thyself, know thy position.

glyphs.name: Sekhem Scepter
glyphs.meaning: Concentrated force ‚Äî the ability to command matter through will
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Mars-Mercury ‚Äî the warrior's mind, speed and precision combined

star_chart.description: The sekhem scepter ‚Äî a flat blade on a handle. Mars-Mercury trine ‚Äî aggressive action guided by intelligence. The sniper's precision.

glyphs.name: Apep (Apophis)
glyphs.meaning: The primordial enemy ‚Äî chaos that must be defeated each night for dawn to come
glyphs.astronomical_identity: Saturn-Uranus ‚Äî the tension between old order and revolution

star_chart.description: The great serpent who tries to swallow the Sun each night. Saturn-Uranus square ‚Äî old structures violently disrupted. Apep must be defeated, but the battle is costly.
